Double strike, menace
Ward–Sacrifice a creature.

flavor_text: [i]“Many beseeched the errors. I was the one they answered.”[/i]
notes:
art3

Was Whenever this creature attacks, surveil 1, then exile the top card of your library. When you exile a card with even mana value this way, put it into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value. When you exile a card with odd mana value this way, this creature deals damage equal to that card's mana value to target creature.
